alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles southeast of Montello to 19 miles southwest of Utah Test and Training Range North to 13 miles west of Knolls to 13 miles northwest of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 10 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
